Texts.Chs: 你可以从^orange;井^reset;里获得水，而水是所有生物的必需物质。请从^orange;采集工作台^reset;制作一个吧。你可以稍等片刻，不一会儿你就可以从井里打水了。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Well^reset; is extremely important, for it provides life-giving water for numerous purposes. Build one at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;. Once it fills for a bit, you can ^green;Harvest some water^reset;

Texts.Chs: 井中的水会越来越多，当它累积到100份以上的时候，你就可以从中获取一桶水。你可以利用它来造一个人工湖，或者放入作物托盘中让作物更好地生长。
Texts.Eng: Water in wells will gradually increase. When you have 100 or more, you can harvest water. These can be used in crafting, thrown to create lakes or placed in a Hydroponics Tray.
